climbs.name: Love And Simplicity
climbs.fa: James Garrett and Franziska Garrett,  early 90's

content.description:
Details of this isolated climb seemed scant in the two guidebooks in which it appeared, so this entry is made at this time. Perhaps still the only one remaining route on the superbowl, the climb ascends a half bowl shaped wall formed most likely from water run-off.

Pitch #1: Climb a smooth slab at the bottom of the bowl past 3 bolts to a ledge (unfortunate in that it negates the homogenity of the line!). Continue to the left up a nice corner (bolt protected to the top of the superbowl and a two-bolt belay. 5.10a, 25m.
content.protection: QDs. It is no longer necessary to build an anchor and walk off as noted in the current guidebooks.
